title: https://state-children-in-care-cardosopab.web.app/
name: State Children in Care
bulletpoints: Collaborated with a client to conceptualize and execute a dynamic portal facilitating seamless communication among case workers, judges, and parents/guardians.

Enabled efficient task management by implementing a feature allowing case workers and judges to add essential tasks ("to-dos") while empowering parents/guardians to upload necessary documents, ensuring a streamlined process.
Enhanced user experience by incorporating a robust system for locating local health providers, providing convenience and support for parents seeking essential resources within their community.

title: https://cardosopab-aero.web.app/
name: Aéro
bulletpoints: Partnered with a client to develop a progressive web app tailored to cyclist safety.
Integrated the MapBox API, enabling the creation of a user interface for a turn-by-turn navigation.
Orchestrated the successful deployment of the progressive web app using Firebase Hosting, ensuring high availability and efficient content delivery.

title: https://bugtracker-cardosopab.web.app/
name: Bug Tracker
bulletpoints: Designed and implemented a comprehensive system that handles all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for tickets, enhancing data management and user interactions.
Successfully migrated from an initial Firebase Firestore database to a MongoDB setup with Mongoose ODM in a Node.js and Express.js environment, embracing the MERN stack architecture.
Demonstrated proficiency in TypeScript, enhancing code quality and type safety throughout the project, leading to fewer errors and a more maintainable codebase.

title: https://cardosopab-breezy-checks.web.app/
name: Breezy Checks
bulletpoints: Independently published my debut mobile app on the Google Play Store, demonstrating initiative and the ability to see a project through to the end.
Leveraged the Flutter framework, to build a sophisticated checkbook register app, showcasing proficiency in mobile app development.
Utilized Riverpod, a state management library, to architect a robust and scalable app with efficient state management, ensuring data accuracy and responsiveness.
